invalid_pin_entered_is_invalid: The PIN you entered is invalid, please try again

name: Name
yout_budget_is_repeating_mode: Your budget is in repeating mode and will repeat
you_must_create_new_budget: You must create a new budget to add movements
you_can_define_duration_dates: You can define a duration, start date and end date
you_can_create_and_share_boards: You can create your boards and share them with your friends and family, if they are registered in Fiico they can modify your board at any time.

intensive_notification_msg: Notifications in intensive mode will be activated daily one week before the stipulated end date, you can activate and deactivate it at any time.
remember_mark_outcome_movement:
Remember to mark your expenses when you have paid them to keep track of your money on a daily basis. 

When marking as Paid, you can only change it when you start the other cycle of your budget.
remember_mark_income_movement:
Remember to mark your income when you have received it to keep track of your total income. 

When you mark as Received, you can only change it when you start the other cycle of your budget.
share_this_budget: Share this budget with your friends and family
has_shared_budget_with_you: has shared this budget with you, you can modify it but not delete it
complete_fields_with_create_budget: Complete the missing fields to create your budget
invalid_password_format: Invalid password format. The password must contain an uppercase letter, numbers and a special character
you_already_have_account: You already have an account with this email, try to log in another way
you_will_able_control_money: You will be able to control your money, your expenses or debts in the best way.
change_pin_message: Activate your PIN for greater security, remember to use a PIN that you have not used and change it frequently.
try_to_create_new_one: Try to create a new one
please_check_your_internet: Please check your internet connection and try again.
try_inviting_a_friend_to_your_board: Try inviting a friend to your board

new_benefits_without_having_to_pay_more: New benefits without having to pay more
you_can_cancel_your_subscription_at_any_: You can cancel your subscription at any time
amount_acquier_diffrent_value: The movement may acquire a different value in each cycle, if this action is disabled, the value of the movement will be static and cannot be modified when trying to generate a payment or collection.
there_no_results_for_your_search: There are no results for your search
the_new_value_will_beUpdated: The new value will be updated to the movement but you can modify it in the next cycle

you won't have to pay a monthly fee to have the best benefits for just..
now_that_import_part_of_valiu: Now that you are an important part of Valiu, we hope you enjoy all our benefits.
active_the_premium_account: Activate the premium account and with it you can improve and add more budgets.
save_more_that_50_percentage: Save more than 50% with the Unlimited Premium Plan
we_have_updated_pin: We have updated your security PIN, remember to update continuously to keep your data safe.
budgets_are_controlled_list: Budgets are the controlled list of your income, expenses and savings in a given time.
start_by_creating_your_first_budget: Start by creating your first budget, add your income and expenses and begin to control your money effectively. Share your budget with your family and friends.
do_you_have_any_concerns: Do you have any concerns? Send us a message so we can help you
